targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__time(dteventtimehour), concat(database_name,".", table_name) as metric ,value
FROM
(
  SELECT
    dteventtimehour,database_name, table_name,value,
    dense_rank() over (partition by dteventtimehour order by value desc) as ranking
  FROM
  (
    SELECT 
      dteventtimehour,database_name, table_name, sum(table_size_max) as value 
    FROM
    (
      SELECT 
        dteventtimehour, 
        database_name,
        original_database_name,
        table_name,
        MAX(table_size) table_size_max 
      FROM ${statsDbName}.mysql_db_table_size 
      WHERE cluster_domain = '$cluster_domain' AND 
        database_name = '$dbname' AND
        table_name in (${tbname:sqlstring}) AND
        $__timeFilter(dteventtimehour)
      GROUP BY database_name,original_database_name,table_name,dteventtimehour
    ) as t
    GROUP BY dteventtimehour,database_name,table_name
  ) as tt
) ttt
ORDER BY dteventtimehour

SELECT $__time(dteventtimehour), concat(database_name,".", table_name) as metric,value
FROM
(
  SELECT
    dteventtimehour,database_name, table_name,value,
    dense_rank() over (partition by dteventtimehour order by value desc) as ranking
  FROM
  (
    SELECT 
      dteventtimehour, database_name, table_name, sum(table_size_max) as value 
    FROM
    (
      SELECT 
        dteventtimehour, 
        database_name,
        original_database_name,
        table_name,
        MAX(table_size) table_size_max 
      FROM $statsDbName.mysql_db_table_size 
      WHERE cluster_domain = '$cluster_domain' AND 
        database_name = '$dbname' AND
        $__timeFilter(dteventtimehour)
      GROUP BY database_name,original_database_name,table_name,dteventtimehour
    ) as t
    GROUP BY dteventtimehour,database_name,table_name
  ) as tt
) ttt
WHERE ranking <=10
ORDER BY dteventtimehour

SELECT dteventtimehour, "_OTHER._OTHER" as metric, sum(value) as "_OTHER._OTHER"
FROM
(
  SELECT
    dteventtimehour,database_name, table_name,value,
    dense_rank() over (partition by dteventtimehour order by value desc) as ranking
  FROM
  (
    SELECT 
     dteventtimehour,database_name, table_name, sum(table_size_max) as value 
    FROM
    (
      SELECT 
        dteventtimehour, 
        database_name,
        original_database_name,
        table_name,
        MAX(table_size) table_size_max 
      FROM $statsDbName.mysql_db_table_size
      WHERE cluster_domain = '$cluster_domain' AND 
        database_name = '$dbname' AND
        $__timeFilter(dteventtimehour)
      GROUP BY database_name,original_database_name,table_name,dteventtimehour
    ) as t
    GROUP BY dteventtimehour,database_name,table_name
  ) as tt
) ttt
WHERE ranking >10
GROUP BY dteventtimehour

SELECT $__time(dteventtimehour), database_name as metric, value
FROM
(
  SELECT
    dteventtimehour,database_name,value,
    dense_rank() over (partition by dteventtimehour order by value desc) as ranking
  FROM
  (
    SELECT 
      dteventtimehour,database_name,sum(database_size_max) as value FROM
    (
      SELECT 
        dteventtimehour, 
        database_name,
        original_database_name,
        MAX(database_size) database_size_max 
      FROM ${statsDbName}.mysql_db_table_size 
      WHERE cluster_domain = '$cluster_domain' AND 
        $__timeFilter(dteventtimehour)
      GROUP BY database_name,original_database_name,dteventtimehour
    ) as t
    GROUP BY dteventtimehour,database_name
  ) tt
) ttt
WHERE ranking <=20
ORDER BY dteventtimehour

SELECT $__time(dteventtimehour), "_OTHER" as metric, sum(value) as "_OTHER"
FROM
(
  SELECT
    dteventtimehour,database_name,value,
    dense_rank() over (partition by dteventtimehour order by value desc) as ranking
  FROM
  (
    SELECT

      WHERE cluster_domain = '$cluster_domain' AND 
        $__timeFilter(dteventtimehour)
      GROUP BY database_name,original_database_name,dteventtimehour
    ) as t
    GROUP BY dteventtimehour,database_name
  ) tt
) ttt
WHERE ranking >20
GROUP BY dteventtimehour

SELECT $__time(dteventtimehour),database_name as metric,sum(database_size_max) as value FROM
(
  SELECT 
    dteventtimehour, 
    database_name,
    original_database_name,
    MAX(database_size) database_size_max 
  FROM ${statsDbName}.mysql_db_table_size 
  WHERE cluster_domain = '$cluster_domain' AND 
    $__timeFilter(dteventtimehour)
  GROUP BY database_name,original_database_name,dteventtimehour
) as t
GROUP BY dteventtimehour,database_name
ORDER BY dteventtimehour asc

list.definition:
select distinct database_name 
from ${statsDbName}.mysql_db_table_size 
where cluster_domain = '$cluster_domain' and 
dteventtimestamp > (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now())-86400*2)*1000
list.label: dbname
list.name: dbname
